word.withdrawminmax: You must enter a limit amount for minimum withdrawals and maximum withdrawals..
word.googleotpmsg: The Google OTP is used for security when you withdraw, member withdraw, or change your password.
word.emailUser: You need to complete the verification to proceed Email address becomes the ID Please enter correctly
word.passwordUser: - Make at least 8 digits including lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, and special characters.However, special characters other than the allowed special characters (~!@#$%^*) cannot be used.
word.passwordUser2: - Do not set a password such as the password for the email you are using or other exchanges.There is a risk of a third party accessing your account if your password is leaked from other sites.
word.nameUser: If you sign up with a pseudonym other than your real name, you will be restricted from deposit and withdrawal and use.
word.phoneUser: Please enter your mobile phone number correctly as an SMS will be sent when withdrawing KRW and coins.
word.passwordPattern: 8 ~ 15 letters including English, numbers and special characters.
word.feeInfoExplain: HoldPort applies the deposit / withdrawal fee as well as the transaction fee as follows
word.limitModal: Do not open for a day
word.name: Name
word.eWalletVlideDesc: The e-wallet address is automatically checked for validity.
word.openorderDesc: ※ Before than one month's history can be found in the Open Order of Order management.
word.my24Desc: ※ Before than one month's history can be found in the Order History of Order management.
word.otpInitLink: OTP INITIALIZATION GUIDE (if OTP re-registration is required)
word.detailInput2: Must be the same as member name.

account.changepass.titles: It's been a long time since you've logged on~!
Change your password for safe member transaction!
If you use an easy password or a password that you use often, it's easy to steal.
